fieldVectors: link//id/mobile-mapping/osmtracker/#--**voice-record-duration**---tergantung-pilihan-anda,-tapi-30-detik-adalah-waktu-yang-digunakan-oleh-penulis.@@@@-  **Voice record duration** - tergantung pilihan Anda, tapi 30 detik adalah waktu yang digunakan oleh penulis.

link//id/mobile-mapping/osmtracker/#--**one-directory-per-track**-direkomendasikan-karena-semua-rekaman-suara,-foto,-catatan-dan-trek-gpx-disimpan-di-folder-yang-sama,-dengan-nama-waktu-dan-tanggal-saat-trek-diambil.@@@@-  **One directory per track** Direkomendasikan karena semua rekaman suara, foto, catatan dan trek gpx disimpan di folder yang sama, dengan nama waktu dan tanggal saat trek diambil.

link//id/mobile-mapping/osmtracker/#--**map-tile-provider**-jika-anda-memilih-untuk-mengunduh-data-peta-sebagai-latar-belakang-ketika-menampilkan-petanya,-anda-dapat-memilih-versi-peta-mana-untuk-digunakan-sebagai-latar-belakang.@@@@-  **Map Tile Provider** Jika Anda memilih untuk mengunduh data peta sebagai latar belakang ketika menampilkan petanya, Anda dapat memilih versi peta mana untuk digunakan sebagai latar belakang.

link//id/mobile-mapping/osmtracker/#--**resume-tracking**-berguna-ketika-anda-menyadari-perekaman-trek-belum-selesai-dan-ingin-anda-lanjutkan@@@@-  **Resume Tracking** berguna ketika Anda menyadari perekaman trek belum selesai dan ingin Anda lanjutkan

link//id/hot-tips/tracing-rectangular-buildings/#--untuk-mengakhiri-menggambar-sebuah-area,-klik-dua-kali-pada-titik-terakhir,@@@@- Untuk mengakhiri menggambar sebuah area, klik dua kali pada titik terakhir,

link//id/hot-tips/tracing-round-buildings/#--letakkan-titik-dimana-batas-antara-dinding-dengan-tanah---minimum-3-titik-diperlukan.-klik-dua-kali-pada-titik-terakhir-untuk-menyelesaikan-menggambar-area.-gunakan-alat-untuk-membuatnya-melingkar-dengan-tombol-pintas-**o**.@@@@- Letakkan titik dimana batas antara dinding dengan tanah - minimum 3 titik diperlukan. Klik dua kali pada titik terakhir untuk menyelesaikan menggambar area. Gunakan alat untuk membuatnya melingkar dengan tombol pintas **o**.
link//id/hot-tips/tracing-round-buildings/#bangunan---mengubah-dari-kotak-menjadi-bentuk-lingkaran@@@@Bangunan - mengubah dari kotak menjadi bentuk lingkaran

link//id/hot-tips/tracing-round-buildings/#--geser-setiap-sudut-sehingga-membentuk-seperti-mengelilingi-semua-sudut-bagunan@@@@- geser setiap sudut sehingga membentuk seperti mengelilingi semua sudut bagunan
link//id/osm-data/geofabrik-and-hot-export/#memperoleh data osm-di-situs geofabrik@@@@Memperoleh Data OSM di Situs Geofabrik
link//id/osm-data/geofabrik-and-hot-export/#memperoleh-data osm-menggunakan-situs-hot-export-tool@@@@Memperoleh Data OSM menggunakan Situs HOT Export Tool
link//id/coordination/remote-tracing/@@@@Menggambar jalan, bangunan, perairan dan penggunaan lahan

link//id/coordination/remote-tracing/#--navigation-software-such-as-garmin-devices-and-apps.-on-smartphones-such-as-osmand-can-provide-routing-information-over-great-distances-if-the-correct-information-is-loaded-into-them.-as-these-rely-on-the-gps-within-the-device-to-locate-the-position-in-relation-to-the-basemap-loaded-into-them,-it-is-important-that-the-highways-are-actually-within-about-15-metres-of-the-right-place,-or-they-will-not-work!@@@@-  Navigation software such as Garmin devices and apps. on smartphones such as Osmand can provide routing information over great distances if the correct information is loaded into them. As these rely on the gps within the device to locate the position in relation to the basemap loaded into them, it is important that the highways are actually within about 15 metres of the right place, or they will not work!

link//id/coordination/remote-tracing/#--[west-african-hot-mapping-tips-by-user-bgirardot](http://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/user:bgirardot/typical_road_and_residential_task)@@@@-  [West African HOT Mapping Tips by user Bgirardot](http://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/User:Bgirardot/Typical_Road_and_Residential_Task)

link//id/coordination/tm-user/#--click-to-view-messages-and-notifications-sent-to-you,-![tm-notifications][]{:style="float:left;height:18px"}-icon,-top-right.@@@@- Click to view messages and notifications sent to you, ![TM notifications][]{:style="float:left;height:18px"} icon, top right.
link//id/coordination/tm-user/#--search-and-filter-options-along-the-top@@@@- Search and Filter options along the top

link//id/coordination/tm-user/#--**search-projects**---if-you-know-the-number-of-the-project-you-want-to-work-on,-you-can-enter-it-in-'search-projects'-and-be-taken-directly-to-it.-you-can-also-search-on-text-from-within-the-project-description.@@@@- **Search Projects** - If you know the number of the project you want to work on, you can enter it in 'Search Projects' and be taken directly to it. You can also search on text from within the project description.
link//id/coordination/tm-user/#icons-indicate-the-types-of-mapping,-such-as;@@@@Icons indicate the types of mapping, such as;

link//id/coordination/tm-user/#--**tasks**-a-list-of-tasks-which-can-be-filtered-according-to-'all',-'available-for-mapping',-or-'ready-for-validation'.@@@@- **Tasks** A list of tasks which can be filtered according to 'All', 'Available for mapping', or 'Ready for validation'.
link//id/coordination/tm-user/#--the-uncolored-tasks-are-ready-and-available-for-mapping@@@@- The uncolored tasks are ready and available for mapping

link//id/coordination/tm-user/#--**completion**-where-you-will-later-indicate-why-you-have-left-this-task,-such-as-you-have-completed-the-required-mapping,-or-you-were-unable-to-finish-it-for-some-reason---make-sure-you-leave-a-message-indicating-why,-such-as-"-*run-out-of-time,-i've-done-all-of-the-top-half-of-the-square,-but-there-is-a-lot-more-to-be-done-in-the-bottom-half*-"-before-you-select-**select-another-task**.@@@@- **COMPLETION** where you will later indicate why you have left this task, such as you have completed the required mapping, or you were unable to finish it for some reason - make sure you leave a message indicating why, such as " *Run out of time, I've done all of the top half of the square, but there is a lot more to be done in the bottom half* " before you select **Select another Task**.
link//id/coordination/tm-user/#ending-your-mapping-of-a-task-or-square@@@@Ending your mapping of a Task or Square
link//id/coordination/tm-user/#unlocking-a-task-before-it-is-complete@@@@Unlocking a Task before it is complete
link//id/coordination/tm-user/#submit-task-or-unlocking-a-task-that-is-completely-mapped@@@@Submit Task or Unlocking a Task that is completely mapped
link//id/coordination/tm-user/#sending-a-message-from-the-comment-box@@@@Sending a message from the comment box
link//id/coordination/tm-user/#referring-to-a-particular-task-when-sending-an-email@@@@Referring to a particular task when sending an email
link//id/coordination/tm-user/#1.-click-on-the-task-square-concerned@@@@1. Click on the task square concerned
link//id/coordination/tm-user/#leaving-a-project-question-/-comment-/-contacting-the-project-creator@@@@Leaving a Project question / comment / contacting the Project creator

link//id/coordination/tm-user/#once-in-the-editor-of-their-choice,-**the-validator-will-have-to-manually-download-the-osm-data**-for-task-areas-selected.-this-is-to-prevent-downloading-all-of-the-osm-data-between-the-selected-tasks.@@@@Once in the editor of their choice, **the validator will have to manually download the OSM data** for task areas selected. This is to prevent downloading all of the OSM data between the selected Tasks.

link//id/coordination/tm-user/#once-in-the-editor-of-their-choice,-**the-validator-will-have-to-manually-download-the-osm-data**-for-task-areas-selected.-this-is-to-prevent-downloading-all-of-the-osm-data-between-the-selected-tasks.@@@@Once in the editor of their choice, **the validator will have to manually download the OSM data** for task areas selected. This is to prevent downloading all of the OSM data between the selected tasks.
link//id/coordination/tm-admin/#advanced:-define-mapping-project-areas-and-tasks-with-imported-geodata@@@@Advanced: Define mapping project areas and tasks with imported geodata

link//id/coordination/tm-admin/#--description---used-for-display-in-lists-and-motivational-information-for-mappers@@@@- Description - Used for display in lists and motivational information for mappers
link//id/beginner/id-editor/#mengatur-background-layer-atau-lapisan-latar-belakang@@@@Mengatur Background Layer atau Lapisan Latar Belakang

link//id/beginner/id-editor/#--kursor-mouse-anda-akan-berubah-menjadi-tanda-plus-(+).-sekarang,-klik-pada-posisi-dimana-anda-menandai-sebuah-lokasi.-sebagai-contoh,-jika-anda-mengetahui-lokasi-rumah-sakit-di-area-anda,-klik-pada-posisi-bangunan-rumah-sakit-tersebut.@@@@- Kursor mouse Anda akan berubah menjadi tanda plus (+). Sekarang, klik pada posisi dimana Anda menandai sebuah lokasi. Sebagai contoh, jika Anda mengetahui lokasi Rumah Sakit di area anda, klik pada posisi bangunan rumah sakit tersebut.

link//id/beginner/id-editor/#--kursor-mouse-anda-akan-berubah-menjadi-tanda-plus-(+).-cari-objek-jalan-yang-belum-digambarkan-di-peta-lalu-gambarkan-objek-jalan-tersebut.-klik-satu-kali-pada-titik-dimana-segmen-jalan-tersebut-dimulai,-gerakan-mouse-anda,-dan-klik-lagi-untuk-menambahkan-titik-berikutnya-klik-dua-kali-untuk-mengakhiri-proses-menggambar.-perhatikan-panel-yang-ada-di-sebelah-kiri.@@@@-  Kursor mouse Anda akan berubah menjadi tanda plus (+). Cari objek jalan yang belum digambarkan di peta lalu gambarkan objek jalan tersebut. Klik satu kali pada titik dimana segmen jalan tersebut dimulai, gerakan mouse Anda, dan klik lagi untuk menambahkan titik berikutnya Klik dua kali untuk mengakhiri proses menggambar. Perhatikan panel yang ada di sebelah kiri.

link//id/beginner/id-editor/#--kursor-mouse-anda-akan-berubah-menjadi-tanda-plus-(+).-cobalah-untuk-menggambar-bangunan-menggunakan-citra-satelit-sebagai-panduan-anda.@@@@- Kursor mouse Anda akan berubah menjadi tanda plus (+). Cobalah untuk menggambar bangunan menggunakan citra satelit sebagai panduan Anda.
link//id/beginner/id-editor/#--ini-akan-menampilkan-seluruh-tag-terkait-fitur-tersebut.@@@@- Ini akan menampilkan seluruh tag terkait fitur tersebut.
link//id/beginner/id-editor/#--ketika-anda-menambahkan-banyak-bangunan-(lihat-buildings_tool-plugin)@@@@- Ketika Anda menambahkan banyak bangunan (Lihat buildings_tool plugin)

link//id/mobile-mapping/field-papers/#--take-your-field-paper-outside,-and-use-it-as-a-guide-to-walk-and-identify-new-places-that-are-not-on-the-map.@@@@- Take your Field Paper outside, and use it as a guide to walk and identify new places that are not on the map.

link//id/mobile-mapping/field-papers/#once-you-have-your-field-paper-scanned-and-saved-on-the-computer,-open-your-web-browser-and-return-to-fieldpapers.org,-just-as-before.@@@@Once you have your Field Paper scanned and saved on the computer, open your web browser and return to fieldpapers.org, just as before.
link//id/mobile-mapping/field-papers/#--open-josm-and-go-to-edit-->-preferences.@@@@- Open JOSM and go to Edit -> Preferences.

link//id/mobile-mapping/field-papers/#now-can-load-your-field-paper-into-josm-and-use-it-to-add-the-information-you-collected-to-openstreetmap.-unless-you-still-have-the-web-page-with-your-snapshots-open-or-stored-a-bookmark-to-it,-return-to-the-field-papers-website,-by-typing-[fieldpapers.org](http://fieldpapers.org/)-in-your-web-browser,-just-as-before.@@@@Now can load your Field Paper into JOSM and use it to add the information you collected to OpenStreetMap. Unless you still have the web page with your snapshots open or stored a bookmark to it, return to the Field Papers website, by typing [fieldpapers.org](http://fieldpapers.org/) in your web browser, just as before.

link//id/beginner/#apakah-anda-baru-pertama-kali-mengenal-openstreetmap-dan-ingin-berkontribusi-dalam-menambahkan-data-peta?@@@@Apakah Anda baru pertama kali mengenal OpenStreetMap dan ingin berkontribusi dalam menambahkan data peta?

link//id/beginner/#anda-telah-mengetahui-bagaimana-cara-menggunakan-editor-dan-ingin-berkontribusi-dalam-pemetaan-dalam-bidang-kemanusiaan?@@@@Anda telah mengetahui bagaimana cara menggunakan editor dan ingin berkontribusi dalam pemetaan dalam bidang kemanusiaan?

link//id/beginner/#poin-utama-adalah-untuk-belajar-bagaimana-pemetaan-dalam-konteks-ini-dapat-terkoordinasi-dengan-baik.@@@@Poin utama adalah untuk belajar bagaimana pemetaan dalam konteks ini dapat terkoordinasi dengan baik.
link//id/beginner/#apakah-anda-ingin-menggunakan-openstreetmap-pada-perangkat-seluler?@@@@Apakah Anda ingin menggunakan OpenStreetMap pada perangkat seluler?
link//id/beginner/#anda-sudah-familier-dengan-perangkat-sig-dan-ingin-mendapatkan-data-mentah?@@@@Anda sudah familier dengan perangkat SIG dan ingin mendapatkan data mentah?
link//id/beginner/moving-forward/#--klik-pada-milis-dimana-anda-ingin-bergabung.@@@@- Klik pada milis dimana Anda ingin bergabung.
link//id/hot-tips/@@@@HOT Tips - Memulai untuk pembuat peta pemula - iD editor
link//id/hot-tips/tagging/#relations---seperti-bangunan-dengan-halaman-atau-pulau-di-sungai@@@@Relations - seperti bangunan dengan halaman atau pulau di sungai

link//id/mobile-mapping/using-gps/#--the-gps-has-different-screens-and-menus-that-allow-you-to-do-different-things.-to-switch-between-screens,-press-the-button-marked-“x”,-just-above-the-power-button-on-the-right-side-of-the-device.-this-button-also-serves-to-go-back.-if-you-press-something-by-mistake-and-would-like-to-cancel-or-go-back,-press-the-“x”-button.@@@@-   The GPS has different screens and menus that allow you to do different things. To switch between screens, press the button marked “X”, just above the power button on the right side of the device. This button also serves to go back. If you press something by mistake and would like to cancel or go back, press the “X” button.
link//id/mobile-mapping/using-gps/#<!---note-unnecessary-perhaps?-add-to-advanced-section@@@@<!-- note unnecessary perhaps? add to advanced section

link//id/mobile-mapping/using-gps/#--you-can-see-on-this-page-some-information-about-the-waypoint-that-you-are-saving.-first-is-the-name.-if-this-is-your-first-waypoint,-it-probably-reads-“001”.-this-is-the-number-you-should-record-on-paper-along-with-the-information-you-want-to-collect-with-this-object.-next-you-will-see-the-time-and-date-when-the-point-is-recorded.-below-that-are-the-coordinates,-followed-by-the-altitude.@@@@-   You can see on this page some information about the waypoint that you are saving. First is the name. If this is your first waypoint, it probably reads “001”. This is the number you should record on paper along with the information you want to collect with this object. Next you will see the time and date when the point is recorded. Below that are the coordinates, followed by the altitude.

link//id/mobile-mapping/using-gps/#--now-that-we-have-learned-how-to-save-points,-let’s-learn-how-to-turn-the-track-log-on-and-off.-when-the-track-log-is-turned-on,-it-will-automatically-record-your-path.-it’s-good-practice-to-turn-on-the-log-when-you-begin-mapping,-and-turn-it-off-when-you-are-finished.-you-will-then-be-able-to-look-at-the-track-on-a-computer-and-see-the-path-that-you-mapped.-if-you-would-like-to-map-the-course-of-a-road,-it-is-a-good-idea-to-save-a-waypoint-at-the-beginning-and-end-of-the-road,-writing-in-your-notebook-the-name-and-type-of-the-road,-and-any-other-important-information-about-the-road.@@@@-   Now that we have learned how to save points, let’s learn how to turn the track log on and off. When the track log is turned on, it will automatically record your path. It’s good practice to turn on the log when you begin mapping, and turn it off when you are finished. You will then be able to look at the track on a computer and see the path that you mapped. If you would like to map the course of a road, it is a good idea to save a waypoint at the beginning and end of the road, writing in your notebook the name and type of the road, and any other important information about the road.

link//id/mobile-mapping/using-gps/#--if-you-would-like-to-empty-the-track-log-to-delete-earlier-recordings,-use-the-joystick-to-select-“clear”,-and-press-the-joystick-down.-the-bar-at-the-top-should-read-“0%”.@@@@-   If you would like to empty the track log to delete earlier recordings, use the joystick to select “Clear”, and press the joystick down. The bar at the top should read “0%”.

link//id/mobile-mapping/using-gps/#--first,-turn-off-the-track-log-on-your-gps,-by-going-to-the-track-page-and-selecting-“off”.@@@@-   First, turn off the track log on your GPS, by going to the track page and selecting “Off”.

link//id/mobile-mapping/using-gps/#--gpsbabel-is-a-program-that-allows-us-to-copy-data-from-the-gps.-if-you-have-a-copy-of-gpsbabel-on-a-cd-or-usb-flash-drive,-you-can-skip-to-the-next-section.@@@@-   GPSBabel is a program that allows us to copy data from the GPS. If you have a copy of GPSBabel on a CD or usb flash drive, you can skip to the next section.

link//id/mobile-mapping/using-gps/#--cari-file-instalasi-gpsbabel-pada-komputer-anda.-klik-dua-kali-untuk-menginstal.@@@@-   Cari file instalasi GPSBabel pada komputer Anda. Klik dua kali untuk menginstal.

link//id/mobile-mapping/using-gps/#--click-“file-name”-and-type-a-name-for-your-saved-file.-it-should-be-something-that-describes-the-data,-such-as-the-date-and-the-location.-for-example,-_jakarta-07-07-2011_@@@@-   Click “File Name” and type a name for your saved file. It should be something that describes the data, such as the date and the location. For example, _jakarta-07-07-2011_
link//id/osm-data/osm-in-qgis/#--buka-qgis-dan-klik-vector-->-openstreetmap-->-download-data...@@@@- Buka QGIS dan klik Vector -> OpenStreetMap -> Download Data...

link//id/osm-data/osm-in-qgis/#--tulis-nama-dan-lokasi-untuk-file-output,-gunakan-format-file-**.osm**-dan-klik-ok.@@@@- Tulis nama dan lokasi untuk file output, gunakan format file **.osm** dan klik OK.
link//id/osm-data/osm-in-qgis/#--klik-menu-vector-->-openstreetmap-->-import-topology-from-xml...@@@@- Klik menu Vector -> OpenStreetMap -> Import Topology from XML...
link//id/osm-data/osm-in-qgis/#--klik-menu-vector-->-openstreetmap-->-export-topology-to-spatialite...@@@@- Klik menu Vector -> OpenStreetMap -> Export Topology to SpatiaLite...

link//id/osm-data/osm-in-qgis/#--klik-"load-from-db"-untuk-melihat-daftar-tag-yang-tersedia-pada-database.-perbesar-ukuran-kotak-dialog-dengan-menggeser-sudutnya.-anda-dapat-melihat-semua-tag-yang-terdapat-di-data-ini-dan-jumah-fitur-yang-memiliki-tag-tag-tersebut.@@@@- Klik "Load from DB" untuk melihat daftar tag yang tersedia pada database. Perbesar ukuran kotak dialog dengan menggeser sudutnya. Anda dapat melihat semua tag yang terdapat di data ini dan jumah fitur yang memiliki tag-tag tersebut.

link//id/beginner/start-osm/#--apabila-anda-memiliki-mouse-dengan-roda-gulir,-perbesar-dan-perkecil-tampilan-peta-dengan-cara-memutar-roda-mouse.-apabila-anda-tidak-mempunyai-roda-gulir,-gunakan-tombol-+-dan---pada-ujung-kanan-atas-pada-peta-(lihat-gambar-di-bawah).@@@@-   Apabila Anda memiliki mouse dengan roda gulir, perbesar dan perkecil tampilan peta dengan cara memutar roda mouse. Apabila Anda tidak mempunyai roda gulir, gunakan tombol + dan - pada ujung kanan atas pada peta (lihat gambar di bawah).

link//id/beginner/start-osm/#sekarang-setelah-anda-melihat-seperti-apa-situs-utama,-anda-dapat-mendaftarkan-akun-menggunakan-nama-pengguna-dan-kata-sandi,-dan-membuat-perubahan-pertama-anda-ke-peta.@@@@Sekarang setelah Anda melihat seperti apa situs utama, Anda dapat mendaftarkan akun menggunakan nama pengguna dan kata sandi, dan membuat perubahan pertama Anda ke peta.

link//id/beginner/start-osm/#--terdapat-lima-kotak-pada-halaman-ini-yang-anda-perlu-isi-untuk-mendaftarkan-sebuah-akun-pada-osm.@@@@- Terdapat lima kotak pada halaman ini yang Anda perlu isi untuk mendaftarkan sebuah akun pada OSM.

link//id/beginner/start-osm/#--sebuah-tab-atau-jendela-akan-terbuka.-jika-semua-berjalan-dengan-baik,-anda-telah-memiliki-akun-osm!@@@@-   Sebuah tab atau jendela akan terbuka. Jika semua berjalan dengan baik, Anda telah memiliki akun OSM!

link//id/beginner/start-osm/#--sekarang-anda-telah-masuk-dengan-nama-pengguna-anda-pada-situs-openstreetmap,-anda-dapat-menggunakan-editor-id-untuk-menambahkan-titik-pertama-pada-peta.@@@@-   Sekarang Anda telah masuk dengan nama pengguna Anda pada situs OpenStreetMap, Anda dapat menggunakan editor iD untuk menambahkan titik pertama pada peta.

link//id/beginner/start-osm/#--pilih-dari-menu-di-sebelah-kiri-jenis-lokasi-yang-anda-tambahkan-ke-dalam-peta.-anda-kemudian-dapat-mengisi-informasi-yang-sesuai-dengan-nama-lokasi-serta-informasi-lainnya.@@@@-   Pilih dari menu di sebelah kiri jenis lokasi yang Anda tambahkan ke dalam peta. Anda kemudian dapat mengisi informasi yang sesuai dengan nama lokasi serta informasi lainnya.

link//id/josm/editing-with-josm/#--you-should-see-the-layer-that-you-selected-disappear-in-the-map-window.-click-show/hide-again,-and-it-will-reappear.@@@@-   You should see the layer that you selected disappear in the map window. Click Show/Hide again, and it will reappear.

link//id/josm/editing-with-josm/#--lastly,-it’s-important-to-know-that-you-can-only-edit-the-layer-that-is-considered-*active*-by-josm.-if-you-are-unable-to-edit-the-map-in-your-map-window,-it’s-probably-because-you-don’t-have-the-correct-layer-set-as-active.-most-layers,-such-as-gps-points,-field-papers,-and-satellite-imagery,-can’t-be-edited.-the-only-layers-that-can-be-edited-are-data-from-openstreetmap,-which-are-usually-called-“data-layer-1”.@@@@-   Lastly, it’s important to know that you can only edit the layer that is considered *active* by JOSM. If you are unable to edit the map in your map window, it’s probably because you don’t have the correct layer set as active. Most layers, such as GPS points, Field Papers, and satellite imagery, can’t be edited. The only layers that can be edited are data from OpenStreetMap, which are usually called “Data Layer 1”.
link//id/josm/editing-with-josm/#--untuk-mengubah-tag-dari-sebuah-objek,-pertama-pilih-objek-tersebut.@@@@-   Untuk mengubah tag dari sebuah objek, pertama pilih objek tersebut.

link//id/josm/editing-with-josm/#kesalahan-umum:-menambahkan-tag-pada-titik-ketika-anda-ingin-menambahkan-tag-pada-garis-atau-poligon@@@@Kesalahan Umum: Menambahkan tag pada titik ketika Anda ingin menambahkan tag pada garis atau poligon
link//id/@@@@"OpenStreetMap adalah peta gratis berisi semua jalan di seluruh dunia, dan dibuat oleh komunitas pembuat peta yang terus-menerus berkembang."
link//id/coordination/review/#--apakah-seluruh-poi-telah-dipetakan-di-semua-lokasi?@@@@- Apakah seluruh POI telah dipetakan di semua lokasi?

link//id/coordination/review/#--apakah-ada-kesalahan-***topologi***-(seperti-bangunan-tumpang-tindih-atau-kesalahan-relasi)?@@@@- Apakah ada kesalahan ***topologi*** (seperti bangunan tumpang tindih atau kesalahan relasi)?

link//id/coordination/review/#--selanjutnya-pastikan-tidak-ada-satupun-objek-yang-terpilih-di-bidang-peta-anda.-jika-anda-memiliki-objek-terpilih-maka-validasi-hanya-akan-dilakukan-terhadap-data-yang-sedang-anda-pilih.-(kadang-anda-mungkin-ingin-melakukan-pengecekan-pada-objek-tertentu,-tapi-untuk-sekarang-kita-akan-melakukan-pengecekan-secara-keseluruhan)@@@@- Selanjutnya pastikan tidak ada satupun objek yang terpilih di bidang peta Anda. Jika Anda memiliki objek terpilih maka validasi hanya akan dilakukan terhadap data yang sedang Anda pilih. (kadang Anda mungkin ingin melakukan pengecekan pada objek tertentu, tapi untuk sekarang kita akan melakukan pengecekan secara keseluruhan)

link//id/coordination/review/#--kesalahan-seperti-ini-tidak-akan-diketahui-jika-kita-tidak-menggunakan-alat-validasi.-jika-anda-perbesar-secara-detil-anda-dapat-melihat-bahwa-ada-sedikit-tumpang-tindih-antar-bangunan,-dimana-hal-ini-adalah-kesalahan-topologi,-karena-bangunan-biasanya-tidak-tumpang-tindih-satu-sama-lain.-untuk-memperbaiki-hal-ini,-titik-yang-berada-di-tengah-harus-dipindahkan.-jika-bangunan-memang-berdekatan,-titik-yang-terletak-di-tengah-dapat-digabungkan-dengan-garis-yang-terdekat.@@@@- Kesalahan seperti ini tidak akan diketahui jika kita tidak menggunakan alat validasi. Jika Anda perbesar secara detil Anda dapat melihat bahwa ada sedikit tumpang tindih antar bangunan, dimana hal ini adalah kesalahan topologi, karena bangunan biasanya tidak tumpang tindih satu sama lain. Untuk memperbaiki hal ini, titik yang berada di tengah harus dipindahkan. Jika bangunan memang berdekatan, titik yang terletak di tengah dapat digabungkan dengan garis yang terdekat.

link//id/coordination/review/#--banyak-tipe-query-yang-dapat-anda-gunakan-untuk-pencarian-di-sini,-dan-anda-dapat-melihat-detail-dan-contoh-di-kotak-pencarian-dan-dengan-mengklik-tombol-“help”.@@@@- Banyak tipe query yang dapat Anda gunakan untuk pencarian di sini, dan Anda dapat melihat detail dan contoh di kotak pencarian dan dengan mengklik tombol “Help”.

link//id/coordination/review/#--harap-berhati-hati-disini!-anda-tidak-ingin-mengedit-value-dan-klik-ok,-karena-hal-tersebut-akan-mengganti-seluruh-tag-untuk-seluruh-bangunan.-**ini-sangat-buruk.**@@@@- HARAP BERHATI-HATI DISINI!  Anda tidak ingin mengedit value dan klik OK, karena hal tersebut akan mengganti seluruh tag untuk seluruh bangunan.   **Ini sangat buruk.**

link//id/coordination/review/#--we-cannot-change-the-feature-that-has-the-***building:use=mixed***-tag-here,-because-we-have-hundreds-of-features-selected.-so,-to-correct-the-mistake,-we-must-first-find-it.-how?-you-guessed-it---with-the-search-tool.@@@@- We cannot change the feature that has the ***building:use=mixed*** tag here, because we have hundreds of features selected.  So, to correct the mistake, we must first find it.  How?  You guessed it - with the Search tool.

link//id/coordination/review/#--first-let’s-select-only-the-polygons-that-are-within-the-target-area.-to-do-this-we-will-use-the-spatial-query-plugin.-if-you-do-not-already-have-it-installed,-go-to-plugins-->-manage-and-install-plugins-to-find-and-install-it.@@@@- First let’s select only the polygons that are within the target area.  To do this we will use the Spatial Query Plugin.  If you do not already have it installed, go to Plugins -> Manage and Install Plugins to find and install it.

link//id/coordination/review/#--next-let’s-filter-only-the-polygons-that-are-buildings-and-that-were-collected-as-part-of-this-project.@@@@- Next let’s filter only the polygons that are buildings and that were collected as part of this project.

link//id/coordination/review/#--click-ok.-filtering-the-data-with-this-query-will-only-show-polygons-that-have-something-in-the-building-column.-it-also-removes-buildings-that-do-not-have-the-source-tag-associated-with-this-project.@@@@- Click OK.  Filtering the data with this query will only show polygons that have something in the building column.  It also removes buildings that do not have the source tag associated with this project.

link//id/coordination/review/#--right-click-on-the-buildings-layer-(the-layer-we-created-in-the-previous-section)-and-click-“filter...”-this-will-open-the-query-builder.-here-we-can-write-complex-queries-to-return-only-the-data-we-want.@@@@- Right-click on the buildings layer (the layer we created in the previous section) and click “Filter...”  This will open the query builder.  Here we can write complex queries to return only the data we want.
link//id/josm/josm-conflict-resolution/#resolving-differences-in-the-node-list-of-two-versions-of-a-way@@@@Resolving differences in the node list of two versions of a way
link//id/josm/josm-conflict-resolution/#a-simple-workflow:-keep-the-node-list-from-your-local-object-version@@@@A simple workflow: Keep the node list from your local object version
link//id/hot-tips/saving/@@@@Menyimpan komentar chageset & menyelesaikan kotak Task Manager - iD editor
link//id/hot-tips/saving/#hal-hal-penting-dari-menyimpan-menggunakan-id-editor@@@@Hal-hal penting dari menyimpan menggunakan iD editor
link//id/hot-tips/saving/#informasi-lebih-lanjut-mengenai-menyimpan-di-openstreetmap@@@@Informasi lebih lanjut mengenai menyimpan di OpenStreetMap

link//id/hot-tips/saving/#tasking-manager---menyelesaikan-kotak,-atau-berhenti-bekerja-sebelum-kotak-diselesaikan@@@@Tasking Manager - Menyelesaikan kotak, atau berhenti bekerja sebelum kotak diselesaikan

link//id/hot-tips/saving/#--**mark-as-completely-mapped**-kotak-yang-sedang-anda-kerjakan-akan-berubah-warna-menjadi-kuning-untuk-menunjukkan-sudah-komplit-dan-menunggu-validasi.@@@@- **MARK AS COMPLETELY MAPPED** kotak yang sedang Anda kerjakan akan berubah warna menjadi kuning untuk menunjukkan sudah komplit dan menunggu validasi.

link//id/josm/start-josm/#--if-you-have-a-copy-of-josm-on-a-cd-or-usb-flash-drive,-you-can-skip-to-the-next-section,-install-josm.@@@@-   If you have a copy of JOSM on a CD or usb flash drive, you can skip to the next section, Install JOSM.
link//id/josm/start-josm/#--find-the-josm-install-file-on-your-computer.-double-click-it-to-begin-setup.@@@@-   Find the JOSM install file on your computer. Double-click it to begin setup.
link//id/josm/start-josm/#--on-the-left-side,-click-the-icon-that-looks-like-a-paint-can-and-paint-brush.@@@@-   On the left side, click the icon that looks like a paint can and paint brush.

link//id/josm/start-josm/#--now-let’s-open-up-a-sample-osm-file-which-we-will-use-to-learn-the-basic-ways-to-draw-maps-with-josm.-note-that-this-map-is-not-real,-in-that-it-is-not-a-real-map-of-a-real-place,-so-we-will-not-save-it-on-openstreetmap.@@@@-   Now let’s open up a sample OSM file which we will use to learn the basic ways to draw maps with JOSM. Note that this map is not real, in that it is not a real map of a real place, so we will not save it on OpenStreetMap.

link//id/josm/start-josm/#--find-the-file-**sample.osm**.-it-is-probably-in-your-downloads-folder,-unless-you-saved-it-somewhere-else.-click-on-it,-and-then-click-“open”.@@@@-   Find the file **sample.osm**. It is probably in your Downloads folder, unless you saved it somewhere else. Click on it, and then click “Open”.

link//id/josm/start-josm/#--you-may-notice-that-when-you-select-an-object,-a-list-appears-to-the-right-of-the-map-in-a-window-called-“properties”.-these-are-known-as-tags.-tags-are-information-that-is-tied-to-a-point,-line-or-shape-that-describes-what-it-is.-we’ll-learn-more-about-tags-in-a-later-chapter.-for-now-all-you-need-to-know-is-that-this-information-helps-describe-whether-our-object-is-a-forest,-a-river,-a-building,-or-something-else.@@@@-   You may notice that when you select an object, a list appears to the right of the map in a window called “Properties”. These are known as tags. Tags are information that is tied to a point, line or shape that describes what it is. We’ll learn more about tags in a later chapter. For now all you need to know is that this information helps describe whether our object is a forest, a river, a building, or something else.

link//id/josm/start-josm/#--before-you-draw,-you-need-to-make-sure-that-nothing-is-selected.-click-in-the-black-space-on-the-map,-where-it-is-empty,-to-make-sure-nothing-is-selected.@@@@-   Before you draw, you need to make sure that nothing is selected. Click in the black space on the map, where it is empty, to make sure nothing is selected.

link//id/josm/start-josm/#--find-an-empty-area-on-the-map,-and-double-click-with-your-mouse.-this-will-draw-a-single-point.@@@@-   Find an empty area on the map, and double-click with your mouse. This will draw a single point.

link//id/josm/start-josm/#--select-one-of-the-objects-that-you-drew-with-the-draw-tool.-on-the-top-menu,-click-“presets”.-move-your-mouse-through-the-sub-menu-to-the-type-of-location-you-would-like-to-define.@@@@-   Select one of the objects that you drew with the Draw tool. On the top menu, click “Presets”. Move your mouse through the sub-menu to the type of location you would like to define.

link//id/josm/start-josm/#--now-let’s-draw-a-map-in-order-to-practice-the-techniques-you-have-learned.-you-may-wish-to-redraw-the-map-that-you-drew-on-paper-previously.@@@@-   Now let’s draw a map in order to practice the techniques you have learned. You may wish to redraw the map that you drew on paper previously.
link//id/josm/josm-adding-imagery/@@@@Menambahkan tms, wms atau citra wmts di JOSM
link//id/mobile-mapping/basicairdata-gpslogger/#import-of-gpx-tracks-in-openstreetmap-editor@@@@Import of GPX tracks in OpenStreetMap Editor

link//id/mobile-mapping/basicairdata-gpslogger/#--for-further-information-about-this-app-you-can-read-[this-article](http://www.basicairdata.eu/projects/android/android-gps-logger/).
@@@@- For further information about this app you can read [this article](http://www.basicairdata.eu/projects/android/android-gps-logger/).

link//id/coordination/mapathon/#--pengalaman-mengajari-kami-bahwa-kurva-pembelajaran-untuk-orang-orang-yang-tidak-memiliki-pengalaman-pemetaan-apa-pun-sangat-curam-dan-dapat-membuat-frustasi-bagi-para-pendatang-baru-ini-jika-mereka-tidak-dapat-melakukan-pemetaan-pada-acara-pertama-mereka.-hal-ini-penting-bagi-mereka-untuk-memetakan-secepat-mungkin,-sehingga-mereka-hanya-diperlihatkan-dasar-dasar-dengan-id-editor-yang-lebih-sederhana,-membiarkan-mereka-menemukan-masalah-mereka-sendiri-selama-acara-berlangsung-dan-mereka-dapat-meminta-bantuan.@@@@- Pengalaman mengajari kami bahwa kurva pembelajaran untuk orang-orang yang tidak memiliki pengalaman pemetaan apa pun sangat curam dan dapat membuat frustasi bagi para pendatang baru ini jika mereka tidak dapat melakukan pemetaan pada acara pertama mereka. Hal ini penting bagi mereka untuk memetakan secepat mungkin, sehingga mereka hanya diperlihatkan dasar-dasar dengan iD editor yang lebih sederhana, membiarkan mereka menemukan masalah mereka sendiri selama acara berlangsung dan mereka dapat meminta bantuan.

link//id/coordination/mapathon/#memulai-bekerja-untuk-mapathon-anda-paling-sebentar-satu-bulan-sebelumnya-untuk-mengatur-dan-mempersiapkan-acara.@@@@Memulai bekerja untuk Mapathon Anda paling sebentar satu bulan sebelumnya untuk mengatur dan mempersiapkan acara.
